Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board

This package is for classes and interfaces dealing with the structure the field of play for the game.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBoard
    A board defines connections between Territories, it has different constraints based on its size, amount of Players, and other factors in Configuration.
    GridTextBoard
    A implementation of AbstractBoard that is entirely functional, but exposes as much data as possible for debugging purposes.
    Territory
    A Territory is the smallest division that can be owned by a Player in DiceWars.
    TerritoryBorder
    A Territory Border is a model fabrication that encapsulates internal Territory data when it is not needed.

Package com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board Description

This package is for classes and interfaces dealing with the structure the field of play for the game. Different Boards can define different ways that Territories can be linked. A board can return Territories as a group based on queries on the Territories' properties. This includes Boards and Territories as well as the interfaces that they implement that make those objects queryable and able to be modified.
